trends: There has been one other sighting in Benidorm
There were no other sightings in Benidorm on or around October 8th 2012
Summary: RARE images of red & blue colored flying object
divs: Sighting DetailsHere are 2 RARE photos i took with my sony h70 camera of a glowing, flashing star-like object that was changing colors rapidly from red to blue and i managed to capture 2 photos of the object, one of it being totally red and the other being totally blue. the item was far away but i managed to zoom in 72X using VGA quality and bionz technology for the best possible image quality. no such images have ever been captured like this before and further study is needed of this UFO. regards, LondonKaleb.
